name: Neighbor’s Scary Wife
description:
Play Scary wife games who will tease his husband with multiple mischief ways. In this scary wife gmae wife is very strict and cruel. Her husband want to perform multiple tasks and she create hurdles in his way to make him angry. Husbnad shoud be very careful while he is performing multile taska. He should not caught by his wife. in this game the olayer will be the husband and he shoud save hisself from his cruel and scary wife.
Feaures for Scary Wife
- High quality graphics
- Realistic sound effects
- Amazing scay wife and husband enviroment
- Save yourself from your scary wife
- perform tasks as husband

Download fun for free!
